name: SCROLLS, ink.
description:
"SCROLLS, ink." is a 20 second long scroll painting simulator created for the 20 Second Game Jam.

Your job is to paint as many scrolls as you can during 20 seconds! You only need your mouse to play this! Right click to spin the scroll around. Left click to untie the knots that keep the scroll from opening, and to paint on it.

Created in Unreal Engine 5 by:

 Daniel Valdivieso   Amaya Vicente   Iker Peña

▼ Thanks for playing our game :3 ▼
